title: GENERAL
fullText:
Battery-powered tools should be preferred to mains-powered tools since their use diminishes shock risk.
Standards applicable for the use of portable electric tools include â€”
(a) AS/NZS 3760, which specifies procedures for the in-service safety inspection and testing of electrical equipment; and
(b) AS/NZS 3012, which specifies requirements for the use of portable electric tools used on construction and demolition sites.
NOTE The relevant authority may have additional requirements for portable electric tools.
